name: mdclub-openapi
description: MDClub 的 OpenAPI 描述文件
author: zdhxiong

scripts.build-php-sdk: npm run build-openapi && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g php -c config/php.json -o dist/php --skip-validate-spec
scripts.build-angular-sdk: npm run build-openapi && npx openapi-generator generate -i dist/openapi.yaml -g typescript-angular -o dist/typescript-angular --skip-validate-spec
